channel.title: OpenBSD and Zen :: Forensic Wheels
channel.description: About Simplicity and Clarity Attention to Detail The Power of Consistency The Beauty of Imperfection About As a security enthusiast, Iâ€™ve always been fascinated by the world of open-source operating systems. Among them, OpenBSD stands out for its commitment to security, stability, and simplicity. But what sets it apart from other OSes? And how does it relate to my journey with Zen meditation?
